title: Student Plan
description: Contains a user's degree options, progress, and plan

options.description: the user's options for pursuing their degree

plannedCourses.description: list of plannedCourses that the user is planning to take

takenCourses.description: list of plannedCourses that the user has already taken

deficientCourses.description: list additional plannedCourse deficiencies the user must also take
